SqlConnectionAttestationProtocol.summary: Specifies a value for Attestation Protocol.

NotSpecified.summary: If the attestation protocol is not specified. Use this as default value.

AAS.summary: Attestation protocol for Azure Attestation Service

None.summary: Attestation protocol for no attestation. Only compatible with Virtualization-based security (VBS) enclaves. An Enclave Attestation Url is not required when using this protocol.

HGS.summary: Attestation protocol for Host Guardian Service
